description:
- Added appropriate key signatures (completely missing from the previous version)
- Corrected the tempo marking (168bpm is not moderato)
- Adjusted panning for the rhythm guitars (previously uneven)
- Fixed slide-ins, which were incorrectly notated and exceeded the time signature in some measures
title: Far Beyond The Sun

reports.summary: this song is in the key of fm sharp , not f

description:
Reverted back 2 versions. A couple problems with the last version:
- Yngwie did not play Slap Bass lol
- The tuning was changed to standard incorrectly
- the drum track was collapsed instead of spaced out 
- All the levels were screwed up.
title: Far Beyond The Sun

description:
- Made corrections to Yngwie's Lead throughout "Theme 2 - A" (Measures 36 to 49) that made it much more accurate to the album. Involved adding palm mutes and extending notes
- Added missing Hammer-Ons and Pull-Offs in certain licks that likely had them (Ex Measure 54)
- Added missing slides in licks that require position shifting 
- Added the letter "T" above the notes that likely are being tapped in Measure 57
title: Far Beyond The Sun

description: Very minor changes fixing the naming of certain chords.
title: Far Beyond The Sun

description:
Finished spacing out the drum track and made fixes to it throughout. 
Added proper names to the markers. 
Made some minor fixes to certain licks.
title: Far Beyond The Sun

description:
Fixed and spread out most of the drum track (still not done). 
Added missing rhythm guitar parts that were missing. 
Further added names for arpeggios and such.
Made position changes for more "Yngwie-Like" licks.
title: Far Beyond The Sun

description:
Changed the "Bass" track to an actual bass; Added the missing drummer's name. Added a second rhythm guitar track and panned both Left - Right. Did this to balance out the sound instead of having every track at centered at 100%.
Removed the second keyboard track that played in no measures. 
In the process: naming Key Signatures and arpeggios; Markers to the song structure.
title: Far Beyond The Sun

description: fixed an error with coupled notes, causing part of the song to be silent
title: Far Beyond The Sun

description: added bends, and changed some other small errors (timing etc.)
title: Far Beyond The Sun
